switchStrategy(address,address,address,u.details: Used to switch saving strategy of an token

params.amount: amount of tokens to be reinvested

withdraw(address,address,address,uint256.details: Used to withdraw token from Saving Account

params.receiveShares: boolean indicating to withdraw in liquidity share or underlying token
params.strategy: strategy from where token has to withdrawn(ex:- compound,Aave etc)
params.token: address of the token to be withdrawn
params.withdrawTo: address to which token should be sent

documentation.text:
@notice emitted when strategy registry is updated
 @param updatedStrategyRegistry updated strategy registry address
